DOC.brief_summary: The present study aim investigate : 1. whether patient suffer acute resp . chronic ischemic heart disease show high level cadmium ( Cd ) , lead ( Pb ) mercury ( Hg ) local international reference level suggest ; 2. correlation severity coronary artery disease angiogenic angiostatic factor ( endostatin-ES , angiostatin-AS , VEGF-vascular endothelial growth factor , osteopontin-OPN ) The patient population consist 270 female male patient suffer either acute chronic ischemic heart disease ( AIHD : ICD-10 I21 ; CIHD : ICD-10 I25 ) . 3. whether patient suffer CAD valve calcification ( mitral annulus , aortic valve ) show high level endostatin , angiostatin , osteopontin VEGF compare patient CAD without valve ( annulus ) calcification The measurement cadmium ( urine ) , lead , mercury , zinc , endostatin , angiostatin , VEGF ( serum ) osteopontin ( plasma ) patient angiographically verify coronary artery disease fore . Furthermore , basic laboratory diagnostics well data coronary angiography echocardiography collect . Additionally , investigator inquire heavy metal exposition life interview . Recruitment do in-patient stay General Hospital Vienna , Medical University Vienna .
DOC.brief_title: Heavy Metals , Angiogenesis Factors Osteopontin Coronary Artery Disease ( CAD )
DOC.detailed_description: Patients angiographically verified CAD different severity recruit Department Cardiology , Medical University Vienna . Detailed anamnestic clinical data collect incl . cardiovascular risk factor assessment , medication , ECG ( electrocardiogram ) , routine laboratory parameter , echocardiography patient underwent coronary angiography diagnostic and/or therapeutic reason ground underlying disease . The coronary artery system divide 17 segment stenosis grade segment measure . The segment : leave main , proximal/medial/distal LAD ( lad leave anterior descend artery ) , ramus circumflex , first second marginal branch , posterolateral branch , first second diagonal branch , proximal/medial/distal LCX ( lcx leave circumflex artery ) , proximal/medial/distal RCA ( right coronary artery ) , ramus interventricular posterior stenosis grade segment measure . A simple 3-point-grading system ( `` Coronary Score '' ) develop consider frequency severity CAD : 0 point non-stenosed calcified segment , 1 point stenosis < 30- < 50 % , 2 point stenosis 50- < 70 % 3 point stenosis > 70 % . Blood sample determination ES , AS VEGF level take least two day acute event ( angina pectoris , STEMI-ST-elevation myocardial infarction , NSTEM-Non ST-elevation myocardial infarction ) invasive intervention ( angiography ) . ES , AS VEGF analyse serum , OPN plasma ELISA-Enzyme Linked Immunosorbent Assay accord instruction manufacturer . Echocardiography perform evaluate leave right ventricular function ( multiple cross-sectional view ) , valve insufficiency/stenosis/calcification wall movement disorder . Hg Pb level measure full-blood , Cd urine . The outcrop full-blood sample determination Pb Hg do 2 ml ultrapure water 2 ml nitric acid ( 68 % sub-boiled ) . The sample aliquot 0,5 ml , backfilling volume 20 ml . The determination Pb Cd perform ICPMS ( inductively couple plasma mass spectrometry ) accord ÖNORM EN ISO 17294-2 . The determination Hg do AFS ( atomic fluorescence spectroscopy ) accord ÖNORM EN 17852 . The outcrop urine sample determination Cd do 2 ml ultrapure water 2 ml nitric acid ( 68 % sub-boiled ) . The sample aliquot 5 ml , backfilling volume 20 ml . The detection/quantification limit 0,40/2 μg/l ( Pb ) , 0,067/0,13 μg/l ( Hg ) 0,12/0,40 μg/l ( Cd ) . In case quantification limit undercut , follow expected amount use : Cd : 0,3 μg/l , Pb : 1 μg/l , Hg : 0,1 μg/l . In case Cd Hg Human-Biomonitoring ( HBM ) -I II level case Pb reference level German Environmental Agency . Physical activity patient defined/quantified non physical activity , walk less 3h/week , walk 3 hours/week , sport less 3 hours/week sport 3 hours/week . Statistical analysis do SPSS 20.0 . Continuous normally distribute data describe mean ± standard deviation ( SD ) group difference test independent sample t-test correlation calculate use Pearson 's correlation coefficient . Continuous data skew distribution outlier describe ny median , first third quartile minimum maximum . Group differences test Mann-Whitney-U-test correlation calculate use Spearman 's correlation coefficient . For data value quantification limit value quantification limit impute ( value observation ) non-parametric Mann-Whitney-U-test use . All test perform two-sided p-values ≤ 0,05 consider significant . The protocol approve Ethical Commission Medical University Vienna inform consent obtain patient .
DOC.criteria: patient suffer ICD10 I21 I25 , age 1880 , female male , nonsmoker exsmokers least 7 year ICD10 I21 I25 , patient younger 18 old 80 , smoke
